message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can only justify spending up to $9,500. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is still a bit lower than what I need.  How about we split the difference and settle on $9,750? I'm confident this price will still be a good value for you, and it allows me to move forward with the sale.
Hello Alice, I've considered your proposal, but I'm still hesitant at $9,750. I would like to suggest $9,500 as a compromise. I hope this aligns better with both our interests.
